How to unlock FINAL CAMPAIGN?

This torrent gave me a bit of trouble, but I managed to get it up and running smoothly. Here are the steps I took.

1) Download torrent

2) Unzip it into one big ISO file

3) Mount the ISO file with Daemon Tools

4) Install the game

5) Open "My Computer", right click "Might & Magic Heroes VI" and select "open", open the SKIDROW folder and copy/paste the 4 files inside of it into your "C:/Program Files/Ubisoft/Might & Magic Heroes VI" folder, copy and replace all files when it asks.

6) Right click "Might & Magic Heroes VI" after copy and replacing it into the folder, select "Create Shortcut"

7) Right click the shortcut, select properties, and add "/offline" to the end of the target (with a space before the last letter and /offline).

8) Open the game up using the newly created shortcut, and it should work.

This was done using Windows 7 64 bit.
